name: Escape from Hellish Prison Life
description:
Granny Prison Escape Jump Adventure Multiplayer game - is simple but hard to master crazy angry hell neighbor Granny prison escape game - jump & run arcade adventure about haunted gran evil neighborhood.

Angry Hell neighbor Granny asked you to meet in her hellish prison so you were trapped for a long time. Maybe Grand Thief escapist can give you a pie or Xmas sweets? No! It is your luck you can run & jump before saying "Hello, escapist neighbor!", because angry gran is really evil Granny & angry gran from Hell !!! Try to run from neighbor jail as far as possible & return to your parents! Every step is dangerous, some traps are really hard - granny is master of trapping kids! 
Move carefully not be captured by moving saw or escape fall into the pit of acid death! What you only can do in this Grand Thief place is Run & Run faster with friends over Multiplayer!
★ Blox series third part - Multiplayer addition
★ New hell escape
★ Easy controls 
★ Multiplayer
★ Dangerous prisoner neighbor traps - lots of traps in Grand Thief escapist hellish place
★ Blox graphics just to have fun with hellish traps
★ Small game size
★ Featured cool arcade sounds & music loops!

Explore all haunted hellish house rooms & cellar!

Crazy Jailed building full of traps, saw & acid around for all fans of such hardcore run & jump game!

★ Enjoy Escape Grandma's House - Blox #3 Series game ★
